Interface RestaurantServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
RestaurantService
public interface RestaurantServiceInterface
RestaurantServiceInterface ---------------------------- Defines the business operations available for managing restaurants. Responsibilities: - Provides method definitions for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting restaurant data. - Establishes a contract between the controller and repository layers.

  • Method Details

    • getAllRestaurants

      List<RestaurantModel> getAllRestaurants()
      Retrieves all restaurants from the database.
      Returns:
      List of RestaurantModel objects representing all restaurants.

    • getRestaurantsByOwner

      List<RestaurantModel> getRestaurantsByOwner(long ownerId)
      Retrieves all restaurants belonging to a specific owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the restaurant owner.
      Returns:
      List of RestaurantModel objects belonging to that owner.

    • findById

      RestaurantModel findById(int id)
      Retrieves a single restaurant by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique restaurant ID.
      Returns:
      RestaurantModel containing the restaurant details, or null if not found.

    • create

      boolean create(RestaurantModel restaurant)
      Creates a new restaurant record.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The RestaurantModel containing restaurant details.
      Returns:
      true if successful; false otherwise.

    • update

      boolean update(RestaurantModel restaurant)
      Updates an existing restaurant record.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The RestaurantModel with updated data.
      Returns:
      true if successful; false otherwise.

    • delete

      boolean delete(RestaurantModel restaurant)
      Deletes a restaurant record by ID.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The restaurant ID to delete.
      Returns:
      true if successful; false otherwise.
